[RootThemeProvider](./ui.rootthemeprovider.md)

## RootThemeProvider() function

Provider to hydrate the context for the [Theme](./ui.theme.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function RootThemeProvider(
  props: StyledComponents.ThemeProviderProps<CustomTheme>
): JSX.Element
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                                | Description                                                                                                                   |
| --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| props     | <code>StyledComponents.ThemeProviderProps&lt;CustomTheme&gt;</code> | A [CustomTheme](./ui.customtheme.md) that will be deeply merged with the [default Theme](./ui.theme.md)<!-- -->, and children |

<b>Returns:</b>

`JSX.Element`

## Remarks

You probably don't want to use this component directly since it is already used
by the core. If you want to override the theme in some plugin, you probably want
to use [ThemeProvider](./ui.themeprovider.md) instead.
